summary: Showcase Module Testing Complete - Banner Carousel & Media Player. All 21 backend API tests passed. All frontend UI tests passed on desktop (1920px) and mobile (390px). Backend: GET /api/showcase/banners returns 3 demo banners (2 text, 1 image). GET /api/showcase/media-player returns config with 6 media items. All admin CRUD operations work: create/update/delete banners, add/delete media items, update player settings, and fetch-album handles gracefully. Frontend: BannerCarousel renders at top with auto-rotation, text banners show colored backgrounds, navigation arrows and dots work for 3 banners. MediaPlayer renders below icon nav with 16:9 aspect ratio, shows progress dots (6 items visible), captions display correctly. Cultural icon nav renders 6 custom AI icons. Mosaic grid tiles render correctly. Responsive design verified on mobile viewport.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/showcase/banners returns 200
Backend: GET /api/showcase/banners returns list with 3 demo banners
Backend: Banners have required fields (banner_id, type, active)
Backend: GET /api/showcase/media-player returns 200
Backend: Media player returns config with 6 items (4 demo + 2 from tests)
Backend: Media items have required fields (item_id, type, url)
Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/banners creates text banner
Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/banners creates image banner
Backend: PUT /api/admin/showcase/banners/{id} updates banner
Backend: DELETE /api/admin/showcase/banners/{id} deletes banner
Backend: DELETE /api/admin/showcase/banners/{id} returns 404 for nonexistent
Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/media-player/add-item adds image item
Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/media-player/add-item adds video item
Backend: DELETE /api/admin/showcase/media-player/items/{id} removes item
Backend: PUT /api/admin/showcase/media-player updates settings
Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/media-player/fetch-album handles gracefully
Backend: POST /api/admin/showcase/media-player/fetch-album requires album_url (400)
Frontend Desktop: Banner carousel renders (data-testid='banner-carousel')
Frontend Desktop: Text banner shows colored background with text content
Frontend Desktop: Banner navigation arrows work (prev/next)
Frontend Desktop: 3 banner navigation dots visible
Frontend Desktop: Media player renders with 16:9 aspect ratio
Frontend Desktop: Media player shows image with caption 'PinPanClub Training Day'
Frontend Desktop: Media player shows 1/6 counter (6 items)
Frontend Desktop: 6 cultural nav icons render with custom images
Frontend Desktop: Mosaic grid renders (4 tiles, 4 cards)
Frontend Desktop: Bottom navigation visible
Frontend Mobile (390px): Banner carousel renders responsively
Frontend Mobile: Media player renders with 16:9 aspect ratio
Frontend Mobile: 6 cultural nav icons render horizontally
Frontend Mobile: Mosaic grid renders responsively
critical_code_review_comments: BannerCarousel.jsx correctly fetches from /api/showcase/banners and renders both image and text banner types
MediaPlayer.jsx correctly fetches from /api/showcase/media-player and handles image/video types
Backend showcase module properly uses MongoDB without returning _id in responses
Admin endpoints for banner CRUD and media player management work correctly without auth (as expected per requirements)
Google Photos fetch-album returns graceful response for protected albums
seed_data_creation: 3 demo banners seeded (banner_demo_1, banner_demo_2, banner_demo_3). 4 demo media items seeded (media_demo_1-4). 2 TEST_ items created during test run (cleaned up).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 95 tested the new Showcase Module (Banner Carousel + Media Player). Backend: /api/showcase/banners returns active banners, /api/showcase/media-player returns player config with items. Admin endpoints support full CRUD. Frontend: BannerCarousel at top of MosaicCommunityLanding replaces old brand header, auto-rotates every 4.5s, supports image banners with overlays and text banners with colored backgrounds. MediaPlayer below icon nav displays 16:9 slideshow from media items. Both components have data-testid attributes for testing. ShowcaseAdminModule.jsx provides admin panel with 'Banners & Ads' and 'Media Player' tabs.
